name: Casa Sandoval
overview:
Casa Sandoval is a full-service retirement community located in the heart of the Bay Area in Alameda County, California. Boasting over 200 studio sized to two bedroom apartments and five levels of care, Casa Sandoval promotes an active and healthy lifestyle for its resident guests.

Residents of Casa Sandoval are invited to enjoy the many amenities available on-site including a fully furnished game room, plenty of arts and crafts, an expansive library with complementary computer access, and a comfortable theater room. As well, Casa Sandoval delights tenants and visitors alike with luxuries that include a billiards lounge and an old-fashioned ice cream parlor. Casa Sandoval also offers complementary cable service to residents.

More than just fun and games, however, Casa Sandoval caters to active retirees with a well-equipped exercise facility, laundry service, weekly housekeeping and covered parking–all within a neatly manicured and gated community. With meals designed and prepared by an executive chef, the dining room at Casa Sandoval is a popular meeting spot for residents who enjoy the company as much as the food.

Casa Sandoval is centrally located with easy access to highways 92 and 101. Located in the Hayward community, Casa Sandoval is convenient to a number of attractions and activities of interest to active seniors. Within walking distance is the Hayward Senior Center which is open to everyone age 60 and up. The center hosts many events throughout the year, educational seminars, and schedules day trips and tours of the local area. Just a short trip away, Casa Sandoval residents may enjoy a walk in the tranquil Japanese Gardens. These 3 acres of delicately arranged Oriental beauty house a large koi pond and traditional Japanese tea house. The nearby Sulfur Creek Nature Center provides Casa Sandoval residents the opportunity to get up-close and personal with many species of animals, and also offers volunteer opportunities and nature study classes. The Douglas Morrison Theater is also a short trip from Casa Sandoval and features live theatrical performances throughout the year.

The Vision and Values of Casa Sandoval

At Casa Sandoval, residents are the top priority. Management and ownership strive only to employ caregivers who have demonstrated a passion and devotion to serving others. One aspect that makes Casa Sandoval function so well is the solidarity among all levels of staff and their commitment to ensure that each resident is supported and respected throughout their stay.

Through instilling high corporate standards, addressing client needs, and maintaining a quality and caring staff, Casa Sandoval has earned a reputation for being the best retirement community in Alameda County. Casa Sandoval was voted Best of the Bay for Retirement Community.

Casa Sandoval has been successfully allowing retirees to live out their golden years in comfort, style, and class since 1995.

For more information about Casa Sandoval visit casasandoval.com.
